name: Ghostown Studios
tag_list: web-design, internet-marketing, marketing, seo, sem, social-media-marketing
overview:
The Ghostown Studios is a creative web design and development agency located in Warsaw, Poland. They are a small but immensely driven and talented team of people who love working together and design clean, functional and usable websites and web applications.

CREATIVE DESIGN ———————-

  • Branding & Corporate Identity
  • Web Design
  • Print Design
  • Mobile & Alternative Platforms

MANAGEMENT ———————-

  • CMS ( Content Management System )
  • E - Commerce
  • Web Hosting
  • Content & Copy Writing
  • Website Metrics & Analysis

ONLINE MARKETING ———————-

  • Online Advertising
  • SEM ( Search Engine Marketing )
  • SEO ( Search Engine Optimization )
  • Email Marketing & CRM ( Client Relationship Manager )
  • Social Media
  • Marketing Analytics
